General.Name: Seven Utilities and Power Public Company Limited
General.Description: Seven Utilities and Power Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a renewable energy and public utility company in Thailand. The company operates LPG and Petrol stations, and water treatment solutions; transports LPG; manages NGV gas stations; and produces and distributes biogas electricity. It is also involved in the design, construction, installation, operation, and management of water resources and environmental engineering business; and management and development of tap water projects. The company was formerly known as Ferrum Public Company Limited and changed its name to Seven Utilities and Power Public Company Limited in April 2018. Seven Utilities and Power Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

8.Name: Ms. Patcharin  Singthuen
8.Title: VP of Exec. Office & Company Sec.
